import React,{ Component} from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; class CurrentlyReading extends React.Component{ static propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired } render(){ let showingContacts = this.props.books; return(

Currently Reading

    {/* { showingContacts.map((book) => (
    1. {book.title}
      {book.authors}
    ))} */}
  1. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
); } } export default CurrentlyReading;
